species.name: gumshoos
descriptions: Although it wasn’t originally found in Alola, this Pokémon was brought over a long time ago when there was a huge Rattata outbreak.
It adores having Rattata and Raticate for dinner, but as it’s diurnal, it never encounters them. This Pokémon boasts incredible patience.
Patient by nature, this Pokémon loses control of itself and pounces when it spots its favorite meal—Rattata!
When it finds a trace of its prey, it patiently stakes out the location...but it’s always snoozing by nightfall.

abilities.name: stakeout
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's moves have double power against Pokémon that switched in this turn.

abilities.name: strong-jaw
abilities.effect: Strengthens biting moves to 1.5× their power.

abilities.name: adaptability
abilities.effect: Increases the same-type attack bonus from 1.5× to 2×.
